text: Nonnenhorn is one of the three Bavarian towns on Lake Constance in the district of Lindau in Bavaria in Germany. It is an air health resort and a famous wine town. It is between Wasserburg am Bodensee and Kressbronn am Bodensee (Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg). == References == ==Other websites== Category:Lindau (district)
title: Nonnenhorn
